languages.text: "Ответ, принесенный на крыльях ворона мудрости. О том, сколь страшна измена, нам ведомо многое. Знай же имя страшнейшего из предателей".
"An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."
languages.original_text: "Ответ, принесенный на крыльях ворона мудрости. О том, сколь страшна измена, нам ведомо многое. Знай же имя страшнейшего из предателей".

traits.locale_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."
"An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."
"An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."
"An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."

languages.text: “这个答案带着智慧之鸦的翅膀，我们很清楚背叛有多么恐怖。很好，我来告诉你那个最邪恶的叛徒叫什么吧。”
languages.original_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."

traits.locale_text: “这个答案带着智慧之鸦的翅膀，我们很清楚背叛有多么恐怖。很好，我来告诉你那个最邪恶的叛徒叫什么吧。”

languages.text: «Una respuesta traída por las alas del cuervo de la sabiduría. Conocemos bien el terror de la traición. Escuche ahora el nombre del más terrible de los traidores».
languages.original_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."

traits.locale_text: «Una respuesta traída por las alas del cuervo de la sabiduría. Conocemos bien el terror de la traición. Escuche ahora el nombre del más terrible de los traidores».

languages.text: 「知恵のカラスの翼に乗せられた答え。我々は裏切りの恐ろしさをよく知っている。最も恐ろしい裏切り者の名を知れ」
languages.original_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."

traits.locale_text: 「知恵のカラスの翼に乗せられた答え。我々は裏切りの恐ろしさをよく知っている。最も恐ろしい裏切り者の名を知れ」

languages.text: "Eine Antwort, die auf den Flügeln des Rabens der Weisheit getragen wird. Wir wissen viel vom Schrecken des Verrats. Wisset Ihr nun den Namen des schrecklichsten aller Verräter."
languages.original_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Antwort, die auf den Flügeln des Rabens der Weisheit getragen wird. Wir wissen viel vom Schrecken des Verrats. Wisset Ihr nun den Namen des schrecklichsten aller Verräter."

languages.text: « Une réponse que le corbeau de la sagesse vous a soufflée. Nous ne connaissons que trop bien la peur de la trahison. Eh bien, apprenez maintenant le nom du plus terrible de tous les traîtres. »
languages.original_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."

traits.locale_text: « Une réponse que le corbeau de la sagesse vous a soufflée. Nous ne connaissons que trop bien la peur de la trahison. Eh bien, apprenez maintenant le nom du plus terrible de tous les traîtres. »

languages.original_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."

languages.text: "Bilgelik kuzgununun kanatlarından bir cevap. İhanetin dehşetini biliriz. Tüm hainlerin en korkuncunun adını biliriz."
languages.original_text: "An answer carried on the wings of the raven of wisdom. We know much of the terror of betrayal. Know now the name of the most terrible of all traitors."
